text:
Also, the Lakeland statute is following Tampa's model and will move the statue off city land and to a veterans memorial. Tampa's was moved from the old county courthouse to the cemetery of a family with an ancestor who fought for the Confederacy. 

http://www.tampabay.com/news/humaninterest/can-tampas-confederate-monument-rest-in-peace-at-brandon-family-cemetery/2332728 …
author: scontorno

text:
Another Confederate monument in Florida is coming down today. 

Here's the story we published a year and a half ago on the racist history behind Tampa's monument, which came down soon after.

text: Three months in and a week before #OpeningDay, there’s little clarity from the Trump administration or MLB on the new pact with Cuba and the future of Cuban ballplayers.
author: scontorno

text:
Cuba is preparing to send Major League Baseball a list of 10-15 players eligible to sign with big league teams, even though Trump's State Department has yet to weigh in on the new agreement between MLB and Cuba.

https://www.tampabay.com/florida-politics/buzz/2019/03/21/cuban-mlb-players-who-fled-the-island-hope-no-one-else-has-to-will-trump-and-rubio-play-ball/ …
author: scontorno

text: Rubio declined requests for an interview (or even a comment) for our story on the Cuba-MLB deal, but apparently he has thoughts on it! See below.
author: scontorno

text:
I talked to Cuban baseball players at spring training about the new deal between Cuba and MLB. They graciously shared details of their dangerous journey to get here. 

But the deal is now in political limbo, and that's something they won't discuss.

https://www.tampabay.com/florida-politics/buzz/2019/03/21/cuban-mlb-players-who-fled-the-island-hope-no-one-else-has-to-will-trump-and-rubio-play-ball/ …
author: scontorno

text:
Cuban MLB players who fled the island hope no one else has to make that dangerous journey. But months after a landmark agreement between MLB and Cuba, there's no clarity on the deal from the Trump administration. 

Will Trump and Rubio play ball?

https://www.tampabay.com/florida-politics/buzz/2019/03/21/cuban-mlb-players-who-fled-the-island-hope-no-one-else-has-to-will-trump-and-rubio-play-ball/ …

text: Newsrooms blindly invested in a Facebook-oriented digital strategy bc the company misrepresented its numbers & inflated the benefit. It cost journalism jobs countrywide. So if Mark sees shrinking newsrooms as a problem, buy some local papers & give them back their independence.
